node.title: Tom Brady says he's returning to the NFL after announcing retirement
node.description: "I've realized my place is still on the field and not in the stands," Brady tweeted.
node.content: ["Tom Brady announced Sunday that he's returning to professional football, less than two months after he announced he was retiring from the NFL after 22 seasons.\u00a0", "\"These past two months I've realized my place is still on the field and not in the stands,\" Brady tweeted. \"That time will come. But it's not now. I love my teammates, and I love my supportive family. They make it all possible. I'm coming back for my 23rd season in Tampa.\"\u00a0", "These past two months I\u2019ve realized my place is still on the field and not in the stands. That time will come. But it\u2019s not now. I love my teammates, and I love my supportive family. They make it all possible. I\u2019m coming back for my 23rd season in Tampa. Unfinished business LFG pic.twitter.com/U0yhRKVKVm", "This is a developing story. It will be updated.\u00a0", "Victoria Albert is a News Editor at CBS News. Reach her at victoria.albert@viacomcbs.com"]
